channel.title: c on Website of Dmitry Kabanov
channel.description: Recent content in c on Website of Dmitry Kabanov

item.title: “Modern C”: Notes on chapter 3 “Everything is about control”
item.description: These are my notes taken while reading chapter 3 “Everything is about control” from the book “Modern C” by Jens Gustedt. This chapter explains five control block statements: conditional statements with if, loops with for, while, and do-while, and selection statements with switch.

item.title: “Modern C”: Notes on preamble “Level 1 Aquaintance”
item.description: These are my notes taken while reading the preamble for the part “Level 1. Aquaintance” from the book “Modern C” by Jens Gustedt. This preamble introduces stylistic decisions that the author uses in the rest of the book.

item.title: “Modern C”: Notes on chapter 2 “The principal structure of a program”
item.description: These are my notes taken while reading chapter 2 “The principal structure of a program” from the book “Modern C” by Jens Gustedt. This chapter explains details of C grammar, distinction between declaration and definition of objects, and statements.

item.title: “Modern C”: Notes on chapter 1 “Getting started”
item.description: These are my notes taken while reading chapter 1 “Getting Started” from the book “Modern C” by Jens Gustedt. This chapter introduces imperative programming and teaches how to compile and run a C program.

item.title: “Modern C”: Notes on the book by Jens Gustedt
item.description: These are the table of contents for my notes taken while reading the book “Modern C” by Jens Gustedt, which teaches C according to new language standards, C11 and C17.
